Instruction: Combine the tomatoes, avocados, onion, 1/4 cup of cilantro, and garlic in a bowl. Drizzle lime juice over the mixture and toss to coat.

In a separate medium bowl, beat eggs until well combined; add the remaining cilantro and season with salt and pepper. Pour the egg mixture over the tortillas in the skillet; cook until the eggs are set, about 3 minutes.

Spoon 2 tablespoons of black beans and 2 tablespoons of cooked rice onto each crisp tortilla, then top with the tomato mixture. Garnish the tacos with the remaining 2 tablespoons of cilantro and green pepper sauce.
